elements.text: During a visit to a new healthcare provider, you hesitate to tell them about your HD gene status. You are stressed as you wait for their reaction and to hear about their understanding of HD. Ultimately, you decide to tell them and leave the appointment feeling...

elements.name: New Provider_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
